```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo=FALSE,
                      warning=FALSE,
                      message=FALSE)

# Load Functions.
source("../../functions/myFunctions.R") 

# Load packages.
installMissingPackages(
  c(
    # Include statistical packages.
    "performance",
    "lmerTest",
    "lme4",
    "optimx",
    "MuMIn",
    # Include packages for tidy output.
    "tidyverse",
    "broomExtra",
    "sjPlot",
    "formattable",
    "knitr",
    "RColorBrewer",
    # Include packages for %in% %notin% syntactic notation
    "mefa4"
  )
)

# Set themes and colour schemes.
theme_set(theme_minimal(base_size = 14))

```


```{r load corpus,include=FALSE}
l_star_h_types = c("L*H", "^[L*]H", "L*^[H]", "^[L*H]")

# Load Corpus
m_corpus <- get_m_corpus("../data/m_corpus.csv")  %>%
  # Select only columns for analysis
  select(
    speaker,
    gender,
    mode,
    prompt,
    acc_phon,
    fin_phon,
    lh_mean_f0) %>% 
  filter(acc_phon %in% l_star_h_types)  %>% 
  mutate(acc_phon = factor(acc_phon,
                           levels = l_star_h_types)
         )
```

-  Model works with gender and (1 | prompt) removed
-  Needs trimmed (residual SD > 2.8)
```{r set equation and optimizer}
my_equation = formula(
  lh_mean_f0 ~ mode * acc_phon
  + gender
  + fin_phon
  + (1 + mode + acc_phon | speaker)
  + (1 | prompt)
)

# prompt causes singularity. Removing from model.
my_equation = formula(
  lh_mean_f0 ~ mode * acc_phon
  + gender
  + fin_phon
  + (1 | speaker)
  + (1 | prompt)
)
optimizer = "optimx"
```

```{r run initial model,  fig.height=3, fig.width=9, include=FALSE}

# run model
lh_mean_f0_model <- lmer(
  my_equation,
  m_corpus,
  control = lmerControl(
    optimizer = optimizer,
    calc.derivs = FALSE,
    optCtrl = list(
      method = "nlminb",
      starttests = FALSE,
      kkt = FALSE
    )
  )
)


summariseLME(lh_mean_f0_model, run_step=TRUE)

```

```{r run intercepts only model, fig.height=3, fig.width=9, tidy = TRUE}

m_corpus.trimmed <-
  m_corpus %>% filter(abs(scale(resid(lh_mean_f0_model))) <= 2.8)

lh_mean_f0_model_reduced <- lmer(
  my_equation,
  m_corpus.trimmed,
  control = lmerControl(
    optimizer = optimizer,
    calc.derivs = FALSE,
    optCtrl = list(
      method = "nlminb",
      starttests = FALSE,
      kkt = FALSE
    )
  )
)
summariseLME(lh_mean_f0_model_reduced,
             run_step = TRUE,
             write = "../output_model_anovas/Mode_PA_lh_mean_f0_anova.csv")

```



```{r make tidy model, fig.height=5, fig.width=7, results="asis"}

lh_mean_f0_model.tidy <- analyseModel(lh_mean_f0_model_reduced,
                                write="../output/Mode_PA_lh_mean_f0"
                                )
lh_mean_f0_model.tidy$table

```

```{r do pairwise analysis}

charts <- getModelFixedFX(
  my_equation,
  m_corpus.trimmed,
  write = "../output/Mode_PA_lh_mean_f0",
  optimizer = optimizer
)

charts$intercepts
charts$slopes

```
